title: Global views schema
description: Global views are registered in the app and are available for all scenarios. They can be overshadowed by local/scenario specific views.

additionalProperties.description: Views of a specific input/output symbol. The name of the object must be the symbol name or the symbol name with the _pivotcomp_ prefix. In the latter case, the views are used in the MIRO Pivot comparison mode.
Configuration of the view. The name of the object is the name of the view.
